    The Utility API provides utility services in support of the other APIs

      • ping

        public java.lang.String ping()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Ping function for checking API service availability. Returns OK if successful
        Returns:
        Result from function
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws server side exceptions of variable types.

      • createBulkOperation

        public java.lang.String createBulkOperation()
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a bulk operation progress key. This can then be passed to a bulk operation method in e.g. the Domain API to allow progress tracking of the operation using the getBulkOperationProgress method.
        Returns:
        Result from function
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws server side exceptions of variable types.

      • getBulkOperationProgress

        public BulkOperationProgress getBulkOperationProgress(java.lang.String bulkOperationProgressKey)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the progress for a bulk operation as a BulkOperationProgress object using a progress key generated using the createBulkOperation method. This will typically be attached to an operation in e.g. the Domain API after which repeated calls can be made asynchronously to this method to check progress.
        Parameters:
        bulkOperationProgressKey - bulkOperationProgressKey
        Returns:
        Result from function
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws server side exceptions of variable types.
